title: How Do I Level Up in Boards?
body: Is there a way to level up in LoL Boards? I am not sure how to do it, or if there even is a way for me to do it. I went searching for this answer, and I found that others had the same problem, but it didn't give me the answer that I needed. So, I decided to ask about it myself. If anyone can help, it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: The boards doesn't have an automatic refresh so you need to upvote, downvote, or create a post in a board that doesn't have level requirements.
Posting here can force a manual update, and it looks like I can see you as level 6 now.
ok,,, I just tried, and it updated...but it still won't let me post in boards because it says I'm still to low a lvl, yet it shows me as lvl 30.{{summoner:3}}
Has this issue been fixed for you yet?
I commented and I still face the same problem
